event.name: FOIA 101 Workshop with MuckRock, BINJ & Emerson College
event.shortDescription: Interested in learning how to file a Freedom of Information (FOIA), request? Join MuckRock, BINJ & Emerson Engagement Lab for this works

description.html: Learn how to file a FOIA request using the Muckrock online platform. Help us dig through public records related to police militarization and gun sales in Mass.
